email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 75,000MT of coal from Richards Bay to Qingdao under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel candidate and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thanks for reaching out. We have the vessel OCEAN STAR available for your route. The freight quote is USD 25.50 per MT under CIF terms. The laycan is 2023-10-01 to 2023-10-05.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the quick response. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Could you provide more details on the vessel's DWT and LOA? Also, what is the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao - Additional Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

The OCEAN STAR has a DWT of 82,000 and LOA of 229m. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day. Considering your concerns, we can revise the freight quote to USD 24.75 per MT. Does this meet your requirements?

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao - Revised Quote
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

The revised rate looks more competitive. We are ready to proceed with the shipment. Please confirm the laycan and stem details.

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Great to hear that! We will confirm the laycan as 2023-10-01 to 2023-10-05. We will also ensure that the stem is ready by then.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez
